text: The 1949 New York Giants season was the franchise's 67th season. The team finished in fifth place in the National League with a 73-81 record, 24 games behind the Brooklyn Dodgers. The games were now broadcast on the then new station WPIX-TV, which was launched the year before. == Offseason == * Prior to 1949 season (exact date unknown) **Art Fowler was acquired from the Giants by the Atlanta Crackers.Art Fowler at Baseball-Reference **Foster Castleman was signed as an amateur free agent by the Giants.Foster Castleman at Baseball-Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Opening Day lineup === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
